channel.title: [PI] NPC Hitting When Protect Melee is activated [HELP]

item.title: [PI] NPC Hitting When Protect Melee is activated [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ShuffleScape ShuffleScape
item.description:
@ShuffleScape wrote:

Ok so in NPCHandler class, i tried to make my npc to still hit when someone protects from melee but it doesnt work… here’s i tried to do in applyDamage method in NPCHandler class:

[code]
if(c.prayerActive[18] || c.curseActive[9] && (npcs[i].npcType != 1)) { // protect from melee
damage = 0;
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1) {
damage = Misc.random(71);

                                    }[/code]

it still hits 0.
How can i fix this?
thanks if you help!

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] NPC Hitting When Protect Melee is activated [HELP]
